name: Blastius - GameJam2020
description:
"Out Of Control", so naturally I decided to go with something as simple as "oh no I can't control the ship the way I'm used to!". Cue drifting spaceships.  It's probably a bit forced but I think it does fit.

Graphic style heavily influenced by Ojiro Fumoto's fantastic Downwell.

As mentioned above, the game is in development, hence why I didn't even notice that it's missing a proper splash image when being launched (it loads Game Maker Studio's default image). Thanks everyone who's gonna try it despite the amount of red flags.
